title: Regression: feature flag times out on release0 since 1
body:
### Environment
- Ubuntu 22.04

### Steps to Reproduce
- Go to settings and enable feature flag
- Observe 504 on POST /token

### Expected
- 200 OK

### Actual
- TypeError: undefined
context: ui incident observed in Ubuntu 22.04 after deploying version 2025.10.0.
steps:
1. Call /v1/auth/refresh
2. Open devtools network tab
expected: The ui workflow should return 200 OK without extra retries.
actual: TypeError raised from services/ui/handler.py while calling Call and hitting https://status.example.com/ui.
notes: Review `ui_retry` flag output and logs at /var/log/ui.service. See https://status.example.com/ui for rollout notes in Default and keep reference commit pinned.
